channel.title: Projects on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Morja

item.title: PRISRČNI / enchanting LOVE STORY
item.description: Ker z mano ti si kot zarja, ki briše sledi noči. In s tabo jaz sem kot ptica, ki z vetrom leti in leti. In dan se z jutrom prebudi, ko dvoje rok te stisne v objem, slika steno oživi, tam sva jaz in ti.

item.title: FLORA ADA
item.description: Flora Ada is a figure embraced by flowers, like a goddess of an (un)ordinary day.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE editorial
item.description: A Garden of Fabrics is an artistic reflection on the contrasts of our everyday lives, presented as a reconstruction of the opposition between digital and handcrafted methods.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE
item.description: “A Garden of Fabrics" is a creative project blending digital and handcrafted textile elements. Over 18 months, I explored various home textiles, focusing on their sentimental value. Inspired by a photo of my mom in a flower garden, the project connects to childhood memories and a slower-paced lifestyle, questioning if the younger generation can appreciate the same slow, quality-focused craftsmanship.

item.title: LIFE IS A PALETTE OF COLORS
item.description: Watch a slow fashion film starring Špela Košir, Kresna Dara, Maja Gazvoda, Dana Rohkeus Verč, Zala Maja Ravnihar

item.title: FERTAH, ČIŽME, ČIBE, ŠKREBLNI
item.description: APRON, SHOES, CHICKENS AND DRIED APPLES

item.title: 100 DAYS OF THE SEA
item.description: It’s been a while since I painted with a brush, so I grabbed my acrylic colours and with memories of my 2nd year of BA studies and the class of Colour theories, picked up some waste cardboard and papers from the corner of my studio and just started to create.

item.title: A WALK DOWN MEMORY LANE
item.description: ‘‘A walk down memory lane’’ is a story about dreams, longing, life and transience.

item.title: THE LIGHTNESS OF BEING
item.description: Story behind the photo series ‘‘The Lightness of Being’’ speaks of gifts; them being so precious that we take care of them by locking them away. Can you imagine using them and something happens to them?

item.title: NANA x ZALA
item.description:
Upcycled shirts for a better and greener tomorrow.

Collection of 3 upcycled shirts made in collaboration with slovenian artist Nana Irgolič, who embroidered lovely illustrations on redesigned second hand shirts made by me.

item.title: ZLATICA
item.description: Meadow spreading down the valley. This is where I first learned to skii. Back in the year 2004, when winter was still winter and we got more snow in the lowlands. In Spring, instead of snow, buttercup flowers are shining here.

item.title: POPPY
item.description: When driving around countryside, I spot a steep hill full of poppies and fell in love with the red image. Fragile majestic flowers, dancing with the wind, gleaming in the last sunrays.

item.title: ZLATKA
item.description: I finally managed to get some more sample waste materials, and a new patch sweater was made. Sparkly, colourful. Happy happy. I love colour, I can’t imagine life without it.

item.title: SREBRNA
item.description: Everytime my mom goes for a walk, she says she has to combine comfort with convenience. And she brings home a basket of fresh mushrooms, flowers for tea, wild garlic for cream soups, etc. This time we came home with a camera full of photos.

item.title: ZALA
item.description: Beginning of the lockdown; I moved back home from Ljubljana. It was a perfect time to sort out all the material I have and as I was going through my waste-cutoffs boxes, I found some really cute stretchy cutoffs.

item.title: LIGHT OF THE PAST
item.description: Life and surroundings shape every individual in a different way, I was shaped by living in a small village, in a 6-member family. In April my parents celebrated the 30 year anniversary of their life together, and this photo series was made as a memory and as a gratitude for the family.

item.title: ŠPELA
item.description: Very often, when coming amid unknown people and learning someone is from the same area where I live, I feel connected to them by this fact, and I trust them slightly more than the others. And so happened when starting my part-time student job.

item.title: LOTI
item.description: Besides making one-of-a-kind out of second-hand and waste-textile garments, I love photography. And in the past year, when free of any university work, I decided to spare some time experimenting in the studio and outdoors. I am particullary interested in beauty-shot editorials; capturing peoples’ energy, charisma and communicating it through camera.

item.title: ELA
item.description: I love playing with light and shadow, with colour. And I love being around energic people, because their aura vibrates with your aura if you only let it.

item.title: ŠPELA BRINA
item.description: It was one day in October, the sun still shining bright and warm.

item.title: CVETKA
item.description: Cvetka represents a person who accepts the state of being unwanted, the stage of not belonging somewhere or to someone and still seeing through all of it, becoming something more. Not giving up. Blooming in its own way.

item.title: ROZALIJA
item.description: Rozalija, inspired by colorful Salvation Mountain by Leonard Knight in California Desert Area, USA and clothing details and sillhuetes of the 50s, was designed as my 3rd years’ final collection as a student of Textile and fashion design at the Faculty of Natural Science and Engineering under the mentorship of prof. Almira Sadar.

item.title: MAJA
item.description: Second hand shirts getting a new chance, a new life for a better and greener tomorrow.

item.title: ENI OD SEDMIH MILIJARD
item.description: Eni od Sedmih Milijard is a Slovenian band creating indie-folk music; bringing people together, telling stories, sharing heart-warming melodies.

item.title: IVANA KOBILCA
item.description:
IVANA KOBILCA

In 2018 the National Gallery of Slovenia marked its 100th anniversary with an exhibition of life and work of Ivana Kobilca, one of the most famous Slovenian artists of all time.
